title: 2 Beds 1 Bath ~~ beautiful new floors. ~~ Dearborn, MI  !!
posting_body: Looking for a one or two-bedroom in the heart of Dearborn?
We have our newly renovated two-bedroom and one-bedroom apartments available with beautiful new floors.
and it's the only way to unwind after a long day.
With upscale laundry machines at your own convenience and a parking area with designated spots for your specific unit,
